msbt.message: Ew! Um Maybe you're going for a new look, but that seems a little bit extreme, .
Yeesh I feel like I'm looking at something I really don't wanna see.Huh? Oh, it's you?! I thought a zombie invasion had started. Be careful shakin' those trees, alright?
You You were stung by a wasp?Take some medicine and get better then, !
Your face Oh! Wasp sting. Right.Here, I'll give you some medicine. Hurry up and get better already!
I do dig that wild look you've got going on though, bud.
Ew! Um Maybe you're going for a new look, but that seems a little bit extreme, .

Yikes! Are you OK? Oof. Whatever got you has definitely NOT been skipping stinger day.I wish I had some medicine to give you, but I didn't wanna mess up my aerodynamics, so I didn't bring anyOh! But I can show you how to MAKE medicine. It's easy to do, and this island's got everything you need.
The last thing you want is to get stung so much you faint. Fainting REALLY cuts into your lap times.So make sure you keep some medicine on you, !
